title: Superstar 360 x André Saraiva Shoes
subtitle: Infant & Toddler Originals
description:
Help your little one spread the love and celebrate the planet with every step (no matter how wobbly that step is). These infants' adidas Superstar shoes were designed in collaboration with Swedish artist André Saraiva. Earth-color-inspired 3-Stripes pair with his signature smiling Mr. A icon to give them plenty of reasons to smile.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Snug fit; Slip-on; Two-layer stretch mesh upper; Fitfoam and OrthoLite® sockliners; Adifit length-measuring insole; EVA outsole with deep flex grooves; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Cream White / Core Black; Product code: GY9154

title: Gamemode Firm Ground Soccer Cleats
subtitle: Soccer
description: Let your feet do the talking on the pitch. Express your beautiful game in adidas Gamemode with a choice of styles and designs. Created with a comfortable fit for a wide range of foot shapes, these soccer cleats offer a cushioned touch thanks to their soft HybridTouch upper. The versatile outsole will help you show your skills on both firm ground and artificial grass. The eye-catching graphics borrow from the beautiful game.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; HybridTouch synthetic upper; TPU heel clip; Hybrid outsole for firm and artificial surfaces; Imported; Product color: Bright Cyan / Cloud White / Solar Red; Product code: GV6861
colors: Core Black / Silver Metallic / Sonic Ink

title: X Speedportal Messi.3 Firm Ground Soccer Cleats
subtitle: Children Soccer
description:
Good players create time and space. Great ones leave them both behind. Unlock multidimensional speed in adidas X Speedportal. Additional forefoot studs on the lightweight outsole of these juniors' soccer cleats ensure rapid reactions on firm ground. The coated textile upper includes a supportive flat-knit collar and rigid TPU external heel lock to keep you strapped in. Bold graphics highlight Lionel Messi's lifelong love affair with the ball.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Coated textile upper; External heel lock; Textile lining; Firm ground outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Core Black / Solar Red; Product code: GW8391

title: Y-3 Qisan Cozy
subtitle: Y-3
description:
"Y-3 is a strong examination of the blend of sport and style and the tension caused by mixing tradition with all that is modern."  — Yohji Yamamoto 

Y-3 blends inspiration from its past with state-of-the-art adidas technology to introduce a new silhouette. The Qisan Cozy Shoes evoke the feeling of lightness, with floating transparent 3-Stripes that connect the midsole to the lifted eyestay. They're crafted with a neoprene upper and detailed with leather and rubber accents. The TPU plate shines through the distinctive tooling.
details: Slip-on; Neoprene upper with leather and rubber detailing; Neoprene and suede lining; Lightstrike cushioning; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Cream White / Core White / Cream White; Product code: HR1961
colors: Cream White / Core White / Cream White

title: adidas by Stella McCartney Earthlight Mesh Shoes
subtitle: Women's adidas by Stella McCartney
description:
Find your stride in the adidas by Stella McCartney Earthlight running shoes. Don't be fooled by the stylish design and sophisticated details. This shoe is designed for city running as much as everyday wear.

Take these mesh shoes out for a 10 km run, and you won't be disappointed. The partially recycled EVA midsole cushions your entire foot and to return your energy with every step.

Even the mesh details on the upper shoe are as much for function as style. Made in part with Primeblue recycled materials, they keep the air flowing through and your feet feeling cool.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Mesh upper; Textile lining; Recycled EVA midsole made with 10% recycled material derived from production waste; Rubber outsole; adidas by Stella McCartney logo; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester / Vegan alternative; Imported; Product color: Shock Yellow / Shock Yellow / Core Black; Product code: GX2189
colors: Shock Yellow / Shock Yellow / Core Black

description:
Throw it back to '70s Southern California skateboard culture in these juniors' adidas Nizza Shoes. The classic 3-Stripes get a sun-stained glow-up in while the signature rubber toe and Vulcanized outsole cradle your feet in comfort.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.

And because comfort's a non-negotiable, run or no run, BOOST offers incredible energy return in every step.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

The adidas NMD shoes are based on energetic running styles from the '80s, so you know they can keep pace with the daily grind. Wherever you wear them, you can count on your feet feeling good with responsive BOOST and a soft knit upper that hugs the foot. You can also count on style. Throw them on with joggers or shorts when you want to keep things low key, or wear them with your favorite jeans. The minimalist style looks good every time. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

description:
Who says running needs to be uncomfortable? These shoes are designed to help you run comfortable every time, on any terrain. From a precisely balanced mix of Bounce and increased Boost in the midsole to a new padded tongue and heel patch construction, experience comfort with every step. 

Supernova 2 is now made with a lower carbon footprint of 10% compared to the 2020 Supernova. From raw material extraction, processing, packaging, all the way to the end of product's life, we calculate and communicate its carbon footprint, conforming to an internationally recognized standard: ISO 14067 

To reduce our footprint, we need to measure it. The concise footprint results made available to you, provide full transparency on the complete lifecycle of the product. This is just one of our initiatives to help reduce our footprint.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Boost and Bounce midsole; Reduced carbon footprint; Direct injected TPU outsole; Padded tongue and heel; Weight: 275g; Midsole drop: 9mm (heel: 25mm / toe: 16mm); Imported; Product color: Solar Green / Night Metallic / Grey Six; Product code: GW9092

description:
The 2022 adidas X Kris Andrew Small Pride Collection was inspired by the Stonewall Activists of the Stonewall Uprising in 1969. Together adidas and Kris Andrew Small offer a collection in solidarity & celebration of the LGBTQIA+ community's past & present, honoring unique belonging – creating a  colorful & diverse graphic message among this inclusive & optimistic collection. This partnership is also adjacent to adidas' two key Global Purpose Partners, Athlete Ally & Stonewall UK.

You deserve to be seen exactly as you are. These adidas Superstar Pride Shoes celebrate the diverse LGBTQ+ community and honor the energy that pulses when we all come together as our own unique selves. Matching that energy are the bold neon graphics on the colorful leather upper. The words "BE TOGETHER" wrap their way around the shoe from front to back as a reminder of the power that comes from community.
details: Lace closure; Leather upper; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Cream White / Cream White / Core Black; Product code: GX6395

They have a narrower heel to eliminate slip, and a lower instep curve for a snug fit. Foot-hugging adidas PRIMEKNIT supports and enhances each step, and a Linear Energy Push system keeps you going longer. Design details on the upper celebrate the vintage look of workwear.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.

description: The Terrex Agravic Ultra has been created in close collaboration with one of the world's fastest ultra trail runners, Ekaterina Mityaeva. It is one of the first trail running shoes from adidas to feature a TPE bio-based plate that's made out of 90% renewable carbon.​The plate runs the entire length of the shoe for lightweight, durable rock protection over long-distance mountain trails.​ A blend of responsive BOOST and ultra-lightweight Lightstrike ensures high-energy return over mountainous terrain and cushions every stride to help you keep your pace over technical trails.​
details: Lace closure; Open mesh upper with abrasion-resistant weldings; Snug midfoot with slightly wider toe box; Lightstrike and BOOST midsole with carbon plate layer; Dual-layer Achilles protection and midsole rock protection plate; Continental™ Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Grey Five / Solar Red; Product code: FY7628
colors: Bliss Lilac / Beam Orange / Pulse Magenta

description: Let your feet do the talking on the pitch. Express your beautiful game in adidas Gamemode with a choice of styles and designs. Created with a comfortable fit for a wide range of foot shapes, these soccer cleats offer a cushioned touch thanks to their soft HybridTouch upper. The versatile outsole will help you show your skills on both firm ground and artificial grass. The eye-catching graphics borrow from the beautiful game.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; HybridTouch synthetic upper; TPU heel clip; Hybrid outsole for firm and artificial surfaces; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Team Collegiate Red / Royal Blue; Product code: GV6848
colors: Core Black / Silver Metallic / Sonic Ink

description: These Ultraboost running shoes serve up comfort and responsiveness. You'll be riding on a BOOST midsole for endless energy, with a Linear Energy Push system and a Continental™ Rubber outsole. This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic —  reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; adidas PRIMEKNIT textile upper; Soft heel fit; Linear Energy Push system; BOOST midsole; Weight: 11.7 ounces (size 9); Stretchweb outsole with Continental™ Better Rubber; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic  and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Legend Ink / Silver Metallic / Royal Blue; Product code: GX6642
colors: Cloud White / Cloud White / Vivid Red

description: In 1984, the adidas Forum sneaker unleashed a fury of energy and swagger onto the hardwood. Now, the B-ball vibes are back for your closet. These shoes have the same crisscross ankle design and premium upper that first made them legendary, plus an exposed foam collar and tongue. Enjoy the '80s nostalgia with every step.
details: Lace closure with hook-and-loop strap; Leather upper; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Magic Beige / Aluminium; Product code: GW1905
colors: Cloud White / Magic Beige / Aluminium

description: Put on these adidas shoes, and you're set for a run in the park followed by coffee with friends. With a mesh upper for added breathability, they're meant to deliver comfort all day long. A durable rubber outsole gives you a solid foundation no matter how busy your schedule.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Sandwich mesh upper; Lightweight breathable feel; EVA midsole; Supportive no-sew heel; Durable rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Bliss Orange / Bliss Orange / Beam Green; Product code: GV9573
colors: Cloud White / Cloud White / Silver Metallic
